Create a Parameters Object from the Parameters C++ Class — Parameters
code: ################## ## Constructor  # Construct new Parameters object called "ben" ben = new(Parameters, name = "Ben", age = 26, male = TRUE) #> Error: no valid constructor available for the argument list  ################## ## Getters  ben$LikesBlue() #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ben' not found  ben$GetAge() #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ben' not found  ben$IsMale() #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ben' not found  ben$GetName() #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ben' not found  ben$GetFavoriteNumbers() #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ben' not found

title: Gernerate a SGD model in R — R_model_interface
Gernerate a SGD model in R — R_model_interface
text: function allows creation Model object C++ _R. input_data data.frame containing required columns model (R, E0, Pumping, GWL, H2O_SB1, H2O_SB2). R numeric vector daily precipitation (mm). E0 numeric vector daily potential evapotranspiration (mm). Pumping numeric vector daily pumping rate (m3/d). GWL numeric vector initial groundwater level (mm), first value used initial value SB1. H2O_SB1 numeric vector initial water level first soil bucket (mm). first value used initial value SB1. H2O_SB2 numeric vector inital water level second soil bucket (mm). first value used initial value SB2. calibratable_parameters list calibratable parameters. recommended use json_to_paramter_list create list. const_paramters list constant parameters. recommended use json_to_paramter_list create list.
